english.segment1: When I let myself believe in me. I feel my faith become riddled with disease. I remember the day You spoke my name, You said come follow me. But my stand is weak, I feel ashamed, I say don't bother me!
english.segment2: Too much of me and not enough of You!. Put me in this mud that I'm crawling through yeah!. I need You to free me from this impurity, impurity. Yeah, yeah, yeah!
english.segment3: So I crawl to You, so full of shame.. I know You're there for me but it doesn't feel the same, Feel the same!
english.segment4: Too much of me and not enough of You!. Put me in this mud that I'm crawling through yeah!. I need You to free me from this impurity, impurity. Yeah, yeah, yeah!
english.segment5: There's too much of me. Yeah, yeah, yeah!
english.segment6: You take me by the hand and reveal to me. Why You created me. Now I understand why, why You've been called. The King of Kings!
english.segment7: Too much of me and not enough of You!. Put me in this mud that I'm crawling through yeah!. I need You to free me from this impurity, impurity
english.segment8: Too much of me and not enough of You. Shoved me in this hole and I'm calling You. Yeah, yeah, yeah!. I need you to free me from this impurity, impurity. Yeah, yeah, yeah!. There's too much of me, Yeah, yeah, yeah!. There's too much of me, Yeah, yeah, yeah! Yeah, yeah!
